mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.our_system_order_no AS "ourSystemOrderNo", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.our_system_order_time AS "ourSystemOrderTime", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.taobao_order_no AS "taobaoOrderNo", a.alipay_trade_no AS "alipayTradeNo", a.service_fee AS "serviceFee", a.loan_income AS "loanIncome", a.donation_of_trade AS "donationOfTrade", a.distribution_costs AS "distributionCosts", a.tmail_commission AS "tmailCommission", a.integral_withhold AS "integralWithhold", a.seo_commission_fee AS "seoCommissionFee", a.other_fee AS "otherFee", a.subtotal_income AS "subtotalIncome", a.creditcard_pay_service_fee AS "creditcardPayServiceFee", a.after_sale_refund AS "afterSaleRefund", a.commission_returngive AS "commissionReturngive", a.freight_risk AS "freightRisk", a.point_returngive AS "pointReturngive", a.subtotal_expenditure AS "subtotalExpenditure", a.amount_procured AS "amountProcured", a.express_fee AS "expressFee", a.channel_refunds AS "channelRefunds", a.profit AS "profit", a.import_date AS "importDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_taobao_profit_settlement( id, our_system_order_no, shop_id, our_system_order_time, order_time, taobao_order_no, alipay_trade_no, service_fee, loan_income, donation_of_trade, distribution_costs, tmail_commission, integral_withhold, seo_commission_fee, other_fee, subtotal_income, creditcard_pay_service_fee, after_sale_refund, commission_returngive, freight_risk, point_returngive, subtotal_expenditure, amount_procured, express_fee, channel_refunds, profit, import_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ourSystemOrderNo}, #{shopId}, #{ourSystemOrderTime}, #{orderTime}, #{taobaoOrderNo}, #{alipayTradeNo}, #{serviceFee}, #{loanIncome}, #{donationOfTrade}, #{distributionCosts}, #{tmailCommission}, #{integralWithhold}, #{seoCommissionFee}, #{otherFee}, #{subtotalIncome}, #{creditcardPayServiceFee}, #{afterSaleRefund}, #{commissionReturngive}, #{freightRisk}, #{pointReturngive}, #{subtotalExpenditure}, #{amountProcured}, #{expressFee}, #{channelRefunds}, #{profit}, #{importDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_taobao_profit_settlement SET our_system_order_no = #{ourSystemOrderNo}, shop_id = #{shopId}, our_system_order_time = #{ourSystemOrderTime}, order_time = #{orderTime}, taobao_order_no = #{taobaoOrderNo}, alipay_trade_no = #{alipayTradeNo}, service_fee = #{serviceFee}, loan_income = #{loanIncome}, donation_of_trade = #{donationOfTrade}, distribution_costs = #{distributionCosts}, tmail_commission = #{tmailCommission}, integral_withhold = #{integralWithhold}, seo_commission_fee = #{seoCommissionFee}, other_fee = #{otherFee}, subtotal_income = #{subtotalIncome}, creditcard_pay_service_fee = #{creditcardPayServiceFee}, after_sale_refund = #{afterSaleRefund}, commission_returngive = #{commissionReturngive}, freight_risk = #{freightRisk}, point_returngive = #{pointReturngive}, subtotal_expenditure = #{subtotalExpenditure}, amount_procured = #{amountProcured}, express_fee = #{expressFee}, channel_refunds = #{channelRefunds}, profit = #{profit}, import_date = #{importDate} WHERE id = #{id}
